__TOC__

Below you can find a list of cool utilities and applications to enhance your Ubuntu experience.

=== Conky ===
Conky is an application that writes system stats right on top of the wallpaper on your desktop. The text output is fully customizable via a file in your home folder. An easy-to-read HOWTO on installing and configuring conky can be found on the forums at <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=205865]]</nowiki>
More info: <nowiki>[[http://conky.sourceforge.net/]]</nowiki>

=== Songbird ===
Songbird is an up-and-coming media player based on the Mozilla Firefox core. There's a simple HOWTO for installing songbird on the forums at <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=238328]]</nowiki>
More info: <nowiki>[[http://www.songbirdnest.com/]]</nowiki>
